# The `X86CmovConverterPass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Converts <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> cmov instructions into branches when profitable. <a href="#details">More...</a>

Converts <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> cmov instructions into branches when profitable.

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the MachineBasicBlock CFG.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86cmovconversion-cpp/#l00115">115</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86cmovconversion-cpp">X86CmovConversion.cpp</a>.

## Private Member Functions

### checkForProfitableCmovCandidates() {#a5b98aae815eb10be1df76fd5ea5022c5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool X86CmovConverterPass::checkForProfitableCmovCandidates (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; Blocks, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">CmovGroups</a> &amp; CmovInstGroups)</>}>
Check if it is profitable to transform each CMOV-group-candidates into branch.

Remove all groups that are not profitable from <code>CmovInstGroups</code>.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Blocks">List of blocks to process.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="CmovInstGroups">List of consecutive CMOV instructions in CurrLoop.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
true iff any CMOV-group-candidate remain.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86cmovconversion-cpp/#l00147">147</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86cmovconversion-cpp">X86CmovConversion.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<ParametersListItem name="CmovInstGroups">List of consecutive CMOV instructions in CurrLoop.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">

</SectionUser>
